description: Details required for Conditions 13 (Landscaping Scheme), 14 (Bin Storage), and 15 (Secure Cycle Storage) of planning permission 20/01700/FUL (Erection of a two storey detached house and detached linked two storey annex with single storey detached garage (following demolition of existing house, garage, surrounding terraces and annex building))
